query.name: insert
query.sql: insert into user_account (user_id, user_name, passwd, first_name, last_name, email, active_study, institutional_affiliation, status_id, owner_id, date_created, passwd_challenge_question, passwd_challenge_answer, phone) values (s_user.nextval,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,SYSDATE,?,?,?)

query.name: insertStudyUserRole
query.sql: insert into study_user_role (role_name, study_id, status_id, user_name, owner_id, date_created) values(?,?,?,?,?,SYSDATE)

query.name: updatePentahoAutoLoginParams
query.sql: update user_account set pentaho_user_session=?, pentaho_token_date=? where user_id=?

query.name: update
query.sql: update user_account set user_name=?, passwd=?, first_name=?, last_name=?, email=?, active_study=?, institutional_affiliation=?, status_id=?, update_id=?, date_updated=SYSDATE, date_lastvisit=?, passwd_timestamp=?, passwd_challenge_question=?, passwd_challenge_answer=?, phone=? where user_name=?

query.name: createRole
query.sql: insert into study_user_role (role_name, study_id, status_id, owner_id, date_created) values (?,?,?,?,SYSDATE)

query.name: delete
query.sql: update user_account set status_id = 2 where user_id = ?

query.name: deleteStudyUserRolesByUserID

query.name: restore
query.sql: update user_account set status_id = 1 where user_id = ?

query.name: restoreStudyUserRolesByUserID
query.sql: update study_user_role set status_id = 1 where user_name = ?

query.name: findPrivilegesByRole
query.sql: select p.priv_id, p.priv_name, p.priv_desc, prm.priv_value from privilege p, role_privilege_map prm where p.priv_id=prm.priv_id and prm.role_id=?

query.name: findPrivilegesByRoleName
query.sql: select p.priv_id, p.priv_name, p.priv_desc, prm.priv_value from privilege p, role_privilege_map prm, user_role ur where p.priv_id=prm.priv_id and prm.role_id=ur.role_id and ur.role_name=?

query.name: updateStudyUserRole
query.sql: UPDATE study_user_role SET role_name = ? , status_id = ? , date_updated = SYSDATE WHERE study_id = ? AND user_name = ?
